files.patch:
@@ -460,1 +460,2 @@
-    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JDK="-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE \
+    # Access APIs for Windows 7 and above
+    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JDK="-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0601 -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE \
@@ -462,1 +463,1 @@
-    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JVM="-DNOMINMAX -DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN"
+    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JVM="-DNOMINMAX -DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0601"
